Text: A wonderful unsung artist and I only had one of these trax, yay! Great post - thaks.
For all the people who miss Karl Wallinger's World Party, this is a good substitute until the next album arrives.  Also check out a guy named Sam Roberts from Canada.

Thank you so much!
Just love it like everybody else i Guess!
Have A Nice Day everyone!

Thanks man, especially for All of Our Hands! I agree with you, he is definitely one of the best of his generation, or any for that matter. I just don't understand why he doesn't have more recognition. Cheers! And everyone see him live! You'll never be the same!
